humanReadableName: Smart Discharges Uganda Discharge Variable Model 0-6C
description: This Discharge variable model is for updating the admission risk score at the time of discharge for children under 6-months from the pool of clinical admission and discharge variables.

variables.name: waz
variables.description: The weight-for-age z-score (WAZ) of the child, based on the child's sex, age, and weight

variables.name: feedingWell
variables.description: Whether the child is sucking well when breastfeeding (or feeding well if the child is not being breasfed) at admission. If true value = 1, else value = 0

variables.name: spo2_admission
variables.description: Oxygen saturation at the time of admission

variables.name: illnessDuration
variables.description: The duration of the present illness at the time of admission

oneOf.label: less than 48 hours
oneOf.description: Whether the child's duration of present illness is less than 48 hours

oneOf.label: 48 hours to 7 days
oneOf.description: Whether the child's duration of present illness is between 48 hours and 7 days

oneOf.label: 7 days to 1 month
oneOf.description: Whether the child's duration of present illness is between 7 days and 1 month

oneOf.label: more than 1 month
oneOf.description: Whether the child's duration of present illness is more than 1 month

variables.name: ageInMonths
variables.description: Calculated age (in months, unrounded) of the child based on date of birth

variables.name: bulgingFontanelle
variables.description: Whether the child had bulging fontanelle at admission. If true, value = 1

variables.name: neonatalJaundice
variables.description: Whether the child is less than 30 days old and had evidence of jaundice at time of admission. If true, value = 1

oneOf.label: routine discharge
oneOf.description: The child is being routinely discharged

oneOf.label: deceased
oneOf.description: The child died during hospital stay

oneOf.value: Referred to higher level of care
oneOf.label: referred to higher level of care
oneOf.description: The child is being refrerred to higher level of care at discharge

oneOf.label: unplanned discharge
oneOf.description: The patient fled/escaped, or is discharged against the medical advice

oneOf.label: Feeding well
oneOf.description: The child is feeding well at discharge

oneOf.label: feeding poorly
oneOf.description: The child is feeding poorly at discharge

oneOf.label: not feeding at all
oneOf.description: The child is not feeding at all at discharge

ageInteractions.name: ageWaz
ageInteractions.displayName: age x weight for age z-score

ageInteractions.name: ageFeedingWell
ageInteractions.displayName: age x sucking well when breastfeeding
ageInteractions.description: Age interaction with Sucking or feeding well at admission

ageInteractions.name: ageIllnessDuration
ageInteractions.displayName: age x duration of present illness, 48 hours to 7 days
ageInteractions.description: Age interaction with Duration of present illness 48 hours to 7 days

ageInteractions.name: ageDischargeHigherLevel
ageInteractions.displayName: Age in months x Child's is being referred to higher level of care
ageInteractions.description: Age interaction with discharge status, referred to higher level of care

dependency.dischargeStatus: Referred to higher level of care

ageInteractions.name: ageUnplannedDischarge
ageInteractions.displayName: Age in months x unlanned discharge
ageInteractions.description: Age interaction with discharge status, unplanned discharge

ageInteractions.name: ageFeedingPoorly_discharge
ageInteractions.displayName: Age in months * feeding poorly at discharge
ageInteractions.description: Age interaction with feeding poorly at discharge

ageInteractions.name: ageNotFeeding_discharge
ageInteractions.displayName: Age in months * not feeding at discharge
ageInteractions.description: Age interaction with not feeding at discharge

ageInteractions.name: ageSpo2_discharge
ageInteractions.displayName: Age in months * spo2 at discharge
ageInteractions.description: Age interaction with child's oxygen saturation at discharge
